# 題解

首先，我們會發現**沒有任何資料形態**能做那麼大的運算，因此有幾種思路解決

|              |                                             | Sec     | Mb   |
| ------------ | ------------------------------------------- | ------- | ---- |
| Method 1     | <code style="color : greenyellow">AC</code> | 0.200   | 95.5 |
| CPE_official | <code style="color : greenyellow">AC</code> | < 0.010 | 1.6  |

<code style="color : greenyellow">AC</code> (0.200 sec, 95.5MB)

## Method 1


|          | 0                       | 1                       | 2                       | 3   | 4   | 5       | 6   | 7   | 8   |
| -------- | ----------------------- | ----------------------- | ----------------------- | --- | --- | ------- | --- | --- | --- |
| 0        | <font color="#7f7f7f">0 | 1                       | 1                       | 2   | 3   | 5       | 8   | 1   | 1   |
| 1        | <font color="#7f7f7f">0 | <font color="#7f7f7f">0 | <font color="#7f7f7f">0 |     |     | </font> |     | 3   | 2   |
| 2        | <font color="#7f7f7f">0 | <font color="#7f7f7f">0 | <font color="#7f7f7f">0 |     |     |         |     |     |     |
| $\vdots$ | <font color="#7f7f7f">0 | <font color="#7f7f7f">0 | <font color="#7f7f7f">0 |     |     |         |     |     |     |
